markdownRemark.html: TLDR: WebKit-based browsers throttle requestAnimationFrame to 30fps when the device is in low-power mode, and in cross-origin iFrames.

fields.author: mattperry
fields.description: Webkit-based browsers may throttle requestAnimationFrame to 30fps. Learn when, why, and how you can avoid it.

pageContext.author: mattperry
pageContext.description: Webkit-based browsers may throttle requestAnimationFrame to 30fps. Learn when, why, and how you can avoid it.
